00017   void AhcSlowReadoutModMapper::init() {
00018     _isAvailable.clear();
00019     _CMBlabel.clear();
00020     _HVlabel.clear();
00021     _LVlabel.clear();
00022   }
00023 
00024   void AhcSlowReadoutModMapper::ensureSize(unsigned int i) {
00025     if (i <_isAvailable.size()) return;
00026     else {
00027       _isAvailable.resize(i+1,false);
00028       _CMBlabel.resize(i+1,-2);
00029       _HVlabel.resize(i+1,-2);
00030       _LVlabel.resize(i+1,-2);
00031     }
00032   }
00033 
00034   bool AhcSlowReadoutModMapper::isAvailable(int module) {
00035     if (module >=0 && (unsigned int)module <  _isAvailable.size()) return _isAvailable[module];
00036     else return false;
00037   }
00038 
00039   void AhcSlowReadoutModMapper::setValues(AhcSlowReadoutModBlock* output, const std::vector<AhcSlowReadoutModBlock*>& input, unsigned int module) const {
00040 
00041     AhcSlowMeasuresDblMap_t dblValues;
00042 
00043     // avoid the meaningless warning in AhcSlowReadoutModBlock while filling
00044     dblValues["CMBTEMPERATURES"];
00045     dblValues["CMBVOLTAGES"];
00046     dblValues["CMBVALUES"];
00047     dblValues["HBABVOLTAGES"];
00048     dblValues["HBABTEMPERATURES"];
00049     //
00050 
00051     if (_CMBlabel[module] >= 0 && _CMBlabel[module] < (int) (input.size()) && input[_CMBlabel[module]]) {
00052       unsigned int i = _CMBlabel[module];
00053       time_t oldTime = input[i]->getTimeStamp().unixTime();
00054       output->setTimeStamp(gmtime(&oldTime));
00055       output->setLedSetting(input[i]->getLedSetting());
00056       output->setCmbWidth(input[i]->getCmbWidth());
00057       output->setCmbHeight(input[i]->getCmbHeight());
00058       dblValues["CMBTEMPERATURES"] = input[i]->getCmbTemperatures();
00059       dblValues["CMBVOLTAGES"] = input[i]->getCmbVoltages();
00060       dblValues["CMBVALUES"] = input[i]->getCmbValues();
00061     }
00062 
00063     if (_HVlabel[module] >= 0 && _HVlabel[module] < (int)(input.size()) && input[_HVlabel[module]]) {
00064       unsigned int i = _HVlabel[module];
00065       time_t oldTime = input[i]->getTimeStamp().unixTime();
00066       output->setTimeStamp(gmtime(&oldTime));
00067 
00068       for (unsigned int iV=0; iV < input[i]->getHbabVoltages().size() && iV < 4;++iV ) dblValues["HBABVOLTAGES"].push_back(input[i]->getHbabVoltages()[iV]); // fill up to first 4 values
00069     }
00070 
00071     if (_LVlabel[module] >= 0 && _LVlabel[module] < (int)(input.size()) && input[_LVlabel[module]]) {
00072       if (dblValues["HBABVOLTAGES"].size() < 4)
00073         for (unsigned int iV=dblValues["HBABVOLTAGES"].size(); iV < 4;++iV ) dblValues["HBABVOLTAGES"].push_back(-1); // if there have been not enough HV voltages, fill up to 4
00074       unsigned int i = _LVlabel[module];
00075       time_t oldTime = input[i]->getTimeStamp().unixTime();
00076       output->setTimeStamp(gmtime(&oldTime));
00077       if (input[i]->getHbabVoltages().size()>4)
00078         for (unsigned int iV=4;iV<input[i]->getHbabVoltages().size();++iV) dblValues["HBABVOLTAGES"].push_back(input[i]->getHbabVoltages()[iV]);
00079       dblValues["HBABTEMPERATURES"] = input[i]->getHbabTemperatures();
00080     }
00081 
00082 
00083     if (dblValues.size() > 0) output->setDblArrays(dblValues);
00084 
00085   }

00088   lcio::LCCollection* AhcSlowReadoutModMapper::mapCollection(const lcio::LCCollection* const col ) const{
00089 
00090     if (col->getParameters().getStringVal("TypeName") != "AhcSlowReadoutModBlock") throw WrongDataFormatException("AhcSlowReadoutModMapper::mapCollection expects collection of AhcSlowReadoutModBlock");
00091 
00092     std::vector<AhcSlowReadoutModBlock*> sortedBlocks;
00093     sortedBlocks.clear();
00094     sortedBlocks.resize(_isAvailable.size(),0);
00095 
00096     for (int i=0;i<col->getNumberOfElements();++i) {
00097       lcio::LCGenericObject* obj = dynamic_cast<lcio::LCGenericObject*> (col->getElementAt(i));
00098       if (obj) {
00099 
00100         AhcSlowReadoutModBlock* element = new AhcSlowReadoutModBlock( obj);
00101 
00102         unsigned int moduleNo = element->getModuleNumber();
00103 
00104         if (! (moduleNo < sortedBlocks.size()) ) sortedBlocks.resize(moduleNo+1,0);
00105 
00106         sortedBlocks[moduleNo] = element;
00107 
00108       }
00109       else throw WrongDataFormatException("AhcSlowReadoutModMapper::mapCollection expects collection of AhcSlowReadoutModBlock resp. LCGenericObject");
00110     }
00111 
00112     lcio::LCCollectionVec *output = new LCCollectionVec(lcio::LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT);
00113 
00114     for (unsigned int i=0; i<_isAvailable.size();++i)
00115       if (_isAvailable[i] && ( sortedBlocks[_CMBlabel[i]] || sortedBlocks[_HVlabel[i]] || sortedBlocks[_LVlabel[i]])) { //mapping has to exist for the module and at least one of the records where data of it ended up
00116         AhcSlowReadoutModBlock *correctedElement = new AhcSlowReadoutModBlock();
00117 
00118         correctedElement->setModuleNumber(i);
00119 
00120         setValues(correctedElement,sortedBlocks,i);
00121 
00122         output->addElement(correctedElement);
00123         //      correctedElement->print(std::cout);
00124       }
00125 
00126     for (unsigned int i=0; i < sortedBlocks.size(); ++i)
00127       if (sortedBlocks[i]) delete sortedBlocks[i];
00128 
00129 
00130     return output;
00131   }
00132 
00133   void AhcSlowReadoutModMapper::updateMapping(const lcio::LCCollection* const col){
00134     init();
00135     if (col->getParameters().getStringVal("TypeName") != "AhcSlowReadoutModMapping") throw WrongDataFormatException("AhcSlowReadoutModMapper::updateMapping expects collection of AhcSlowReadoutModMapping");
00136 
00137     for (int i=0;i<col->getNumberOfElements();++i) {
00138 
00139       lcio::LCGenericObject* obj = dynamic_cast<lcio::LCGenericObject*> (col->getElementAt(i));
00140       if (obj) {
00141 
00142         AhcSlowReadoutModMapping* mappingElement = new AhcSlowReadoutModMapping( obj);
00143 
00144         unsigned int moduleNo = mappingElement->getModule();
00145         ensureSize(moduleNo);
00146         _isAvailable[moduleNo] = true;
00147         _CMBlabel[moduleNo]    = mappingElement->getCMBlabel();
00148         _HVlabel[moduleNo]     = mappingElement->getHVlabel();
00149         _LVlabel[moduleNo]     = mappingElement->getLVlabel();
00150       }
00151       else throw WrongDataFormatException("AhcSlowReadoutModMapper::updateMapping expects collection of AhcSlowReadoutModMapping resp. LCGenericObject");
00152     }
00153   }
